articles.author: Michael Gore, Estelle Shirbon
articles.title: Europe dares to reopen as 200 millionth vaccine dose delivered - The Star Online
articles.description: MADRID/LONDON (Reuters) -     As its vaccination drive reaches a third of adults and COVID-19 infections ease, Europe is starting to reopen cities and beaches, raising hopes that this summer's holiday season can be saved before it is too late.

articles.title: Atomic point contact significantly enhances Raman scattering - European Pharmaceutical Review
articles.description: New research shows that allowing the point of a tip-enhanced Raman spectrometer to touch the surface of a sample increases sensitivity.
articles.content:
Posted: 10 May 2021 | Hannah Balfour (European Pharmaceutical Review) | No comments yet

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Vivo promises three years of Android updates for upcoming flagships - The Verge
articles.description: Vivo’s upcoming X-series flagship phones will receive three years of Android OS and security updates. The policy covers phones released after July 2021 in Europe, Australia, and India.
articles.content:
The policy covers X-series phones released after July 2021

articles.title: Biden declares emergency after hackers shut down major US pipeline - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Ransomware attack blames on DarkSide, an Eastern European-based criminal gang
articles.content:
The US government declared a regional emergency Sunday as the largest fuel pipeline system in the United States remained largely shut down, two days after a major ransomware attack was detected.
